name: CreativeMarketingBrief
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A daily, short-form audio resource for digital marketers (with no time).

The internet is saturated with content, and things move so quickly that it’s hard to keep on top of it all. This daily podcast quickly curates highly-actionable, super-timely, and inspirational information faster than weeding through 15+ articles per week. 

Hosted by Jeff Large and featuring the best digital pros on the internet.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
